      • startGame

        public boolean startGame(java.lang.String arenaName)
        Starts the arena game.. It will take care of setting the variables and messaging the player. Will abort if the amount of players it below the minimum player count
        Parameters:
        arenaName - The name of the arena to start the game in
        Returns:
        Will return true if the game was started successfully

      • cancelLobby

        public boolean cancelLobby(java.lang.String arenaName)
        A method for cancelling the looping task for the certain arena's lobby
        Parameters:
        arenaName - The arena to cancel the lobby timer
        Returns:
        Will return true if the arena had an active lobby and it was cancelled

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getPlayerArenaName

        public java.lang.String getPlayerArenaName(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
        Will return if the name of the arena that a player is in. Will return null if none
        Parameters:
        p - The player in question
        Returns:
        If the specified player is in an arena, it will return the name of that arena, if they are not in any arena, it will return null.

      • getPlayerArenaName

        Parameters:
        p - The player in question
        Returns:
        If the specified player is in an arena, it will return the name of that arena, if they are not in any arena, it will return null.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        A simple method for getting how many players are currently in the lobby
        Parameters:
        arenaName - The name of the arena in question
        Returns:
        Will return a primitive int of how many players are in the lobby (0 if none obviously)

      • playerInLobby

        public java.lang.String playerInLobby(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
        Will return if the specified player is in any arena
        Parameters:
        p - The player in question
        Returns:
        If the specified player is in an lobby, it will return the name of that arena's lobby, if they are not in any lobby, it will return null.

      • isFull

        public boolean isFull(java.lang.String arenaName)
        A method used to tell if an arena cannot receive any more players. If either the player count or the maximum player count is zero, the method will always return false;
        Parameters:
        arenaName - The arena in question
        Returns:
        Will return true if the specified arena has a player count that is greater or equal to its maximum player count
